fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Those who try to visit you will be soaked by the rain and give up on their visit, effectively roleblocking them. Players that try to attack you will also get their weapon soaked, and it will remain ineffective, effectively setting their Attack to None for one day. At night, you can lend your rain cloud to a target. The rain cloud is returned to you the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune.
- If a player rolls Forecaster and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
Someone visited you, but they were saddened by your rain cloud.
Someone tried to attack you, but their weapon got soaked!
You were saddened by a rain cloud at your target’s house. You were roleblocked!
Your weapon got soaked by a rain cloud at your target’s house! Your Attack has been set to None.
The Forecaster has lent you their rain cloud!
